review_data.title: Comforting pho for the weather

review_data.content: Rindfleisch war offensichtlich aufgetaut > war gräulich und war absolut ungeniessbar. Hatte sogar Bedenken, das Fleisch zu essen.... schade......

review_data.title: Sunday lunch with friends
review_data.content: My first time there. Wanted to have a vegetarian dish. Mind you, veg dishes are prepared in beef soup. I liked my veg curry with rice. Seating area was tight. Had to share the table with guests.

review_data.title: Pho Bo is super delicious

review_data.title: Simple place,fast delicious Vietnamese cuisine
review_data.content: Simple place for a fast delicious Vietnamese dish esp. soups. What else you need to know. It can be quite crowded and hot inside. Dishes are between 9 and 20 CHF.24 seats. Be fast and enjoy.

review_data.title: Nice little Asian place
review_data.content: Spontaneous bite, nice selection of mostly Vietnamese and some South East Asian dishes, including the beers from the region. Very nice staff, colourful interior, tasty dishes, Truly enjoyed it!

review_data.title: Delicious & excellent value for Zurich
review_data.content: We thought this restaurant was excellent value for Zurich where everything is normally quite expensive. The food was very delicious, we ate a beef pho and a wok chicken with rice. No problems with the staff, they were helpful and friendly.

review_data.title: Fantastic Vietnamese eatery
review_data.content: I love pho and ate it almost every day when I lived in London. This place is a hidden gem at the top of Langstrasse in the red light district. Run by a friendly Vietnamese family, you won't find cheaper or better in Zurich.

review_data.title: Great food and friendly prices
